motionconfig
Functions
mpu_config_motionmode
void mpu_config_motionmode(
unsigned char sensorsr,
unsigned char autoread
)

Activates a motion sensing mode among a predefined list of available modes.

Parameters
sensorsr
unsigned char

Motion sensor mode

autoread
unsigned char

Enables automatically reading the data from the motion sensor and place it in a local buffer

mpu_getmodename
void mpu_getmodename(
unsigned char motionmode,
char *buffer
)

Returns the name of a motion mode from its ID.

Parameters
motionmode
unsigned char

Motion sensor mode

buffer
char*

Long enough buffer to hold the name of the motion mode.  The recommended length is 96 bytes (longest of mc_xx strings).  The buffer is returned null-terminated.  Returns: Name of the motion mode in buffer, or an empty string if the motionmode is invalid.

mpu_printmotionmode
void mpu_printmotionmode(
FILE *file
)

Prints the available MPU sensing modes

Parameters
file
FILE*

Output stream
